ctx: intros n0 n q r H.
exceptions.exn: In environment n0, n, q, r : nat H : S n0 = q * S n + r Unable to unify "match multneg (negOZ q) n with | OZ => match r with | 0 => OZ | S n' => pos n' end | pos n => addpos match r with | 0 => OZ | S n' => pos n' end n | neg n => addneg match r with | 0 => OZ | S n' => pos n' end n end" with "pos n0".

original: intros n0 n q r H. unfold addZ, multZ, posOZ in *. rewrite H. reflexivity.
